siteMetadata.title: Neotoma Workshops
siteMetadata.description: This is a free, open source course on how to use the Neotoma2 R package. It's made possible by a long and fruitful collaboration and possible thanks to NSF and EarthCube. Contributions and comments on how to improve the course are welcome! To file an issue go to:
siteMetadata.bio: Neotoma provides an underlying cyberinfrastructure that enables the development of common software tools for data ingest, discovery, display, analysis, and distribution, while giving domain scientists control over critical taxonomic and other data quality issues.
